metadata.title: Seabird Colonies 2000 from USFWS Beringian Seabird Colony Catalog
metadata.description: Location information was used to generate an Arc/Info coverage for several mapping purposes, such as general distribution and population of seabirds and a number of oil spill contingency mapping efforts. Supplemental_Information: Population is only a best estimate and may rely on historical information. The USFWS frequently updates the Beringian Seabird Colony Catalog. The USFWS database contains several fields that were not be included in the attribute table of this particular data layer.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Location information was used to generate an Arc/Info coverage for several mapping purposes, such as general distribution and population of seabirds and a number of oil spill contingency mapping efforts. Supplemental_Information: Population is only a best estimate and may rely on historical information. The USFWS frequently updates the Beringian Seabird Colony Catalog. The USFWS database contains several fields that were not be included in the attribute table of this particular data layer.
